amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used for reducing the EPA Mercury and Air Toxics Standard (MATS).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 190 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds to be used for reducing the EPA Mercury and Air Toxics Standard (MATS).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 177 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 177 (Roll no. 395).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A068) offered by Ms. Schrier.
